articles.author: Alison Durkee
articles.title: Market ‘Will Punish People’ If Trump Influences Federal Reserve, Bank Of America CEO Warns - Forbes
articles.description: Trump has long threatened to fire Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell, raising fears about a non-independent Fed.
articles.content: Any efforts by President Donald Trump to influence the Federal Reserve could have harmful effects on the stock market, Bank of America CEO Brian Moynihan told CBS Face the Nation in an interview that… [+3329 chars]
